title: The Assassin's Bargain
description: Control the situation. Trust no one.Phaedra Humphrey has been an "Intimate Assassin" for twenty years and has decided it is time to retire. Rather than simply walking away from her legendary career, Phaedra makes a bargain with the boss - Joy Oh - to train a replacement in exchange for total freedom. The bargain creates a complication, however, when Phaedra cannot control her feelings for Petra Brighton, the beautiful woman meant to replace her. It becomes a situation that can get them both killed...When a price is placed on Phaedra's head, can she allow herself to trust others and still maintain enough control of everything in order to protect herself and the woman she loves?
author: B.L. Newport
